name: Dodger (Nico64)
description:
PLAYING IN FULLSCREEN IS RECOMMENDED! (Aspect ratio bug in windowed mode)

- Dodge the missiles while collecting the coins!

- Every once in a while a pear spawns; If you collect it, the spawning gets faster and you are invincible for 5 seconds!

- You have 3 lives.

- Every 10 coins, the background colour changes to a random colour.

Have fun!
